pkgmetadata.longdescription: # tinydb-appengine__tinydb-appengine__ provides TinyDB storage for App Engine. You can use JSON readonly.## Installation```bash$ pip install tinydb-appengine```## Usage```pythonfrom tinydb import TinyDBfrom tinydb_appengine.storages import EphemeralJSONStoragedb = TinyDB('your_data.json', storage=EphemeralJSONStorage)```
